name: The Pirate Bay – Sleek Dark
description: A darker theme which is much easier on the eye when browsing the website Please leave a rating if you liked the userstyle! =================== Your Feedback is Highly Appreciated! Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431

user.name: Crystallis
user.about: Commenting and rating is always appreciated. ツ

additional_info:
Jan 31, 2014 - initial release
Feb 02, 2014 - fixing the logo and uploaded screenshots
May 29, 2014 - added http://uploadbay.org/ domain
Jun 22, 2014 - updated http://uploadbay.org/
Sep 18, 2014 - cleaned up the ugly code
Oct 02, 2014 - fixed a few things and added domain http://www.promobay.org/ | added option to remove promo videos and images from the front page
May 23, 2015 - updated to new domains
